explore_toast_from_submit: Thank you. Your memory will be now part of the peace machine.
main_description: The Peace Machine is built from different stories, perspectives and the shared will to create peace. Share your own personal memory and you will be part of the Peace Machine. You can also explore memories shared by others.
submit_acknowlegment: Thanks for writing your memory. Now you can share it with others.
submit_disclaimer: By submitting, I confirm that I am the original author of this memory and have the right to publish it. I also confirm that the memory does not contain any personal or sensitive information about others.
submit_please_extend: Would you like to extend your story?
submit_type_more: Please share a bit more to participate in building the Peace Machine.
